data.oai_dc:dc: Pollen counts extracted from the Czech Quaternary Palynological Database (https://botany.natur.cuni.cz/palycz/) on 2 November 2017 covering the entire study area. Pollen taxonomy follows Beug (2004). Age is given in the calibrated age scale in BP (0 cal BP = 1950). Regions are defined as in Kuneš et al. (2009).
